physical_appearance: This is a bag featuring decorative beadwork embroidery. It is made from multicoloured textile with an opening at the top. The center features a stylized beaded design of two birds perched on either side of a deity figure. The left side of the bag is slightly torn.
subject_terms_1: beadwork (visual works) embroidery (visual works) birds (motifs) deities depictions (visual works)
